entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
